description:
For off-track touring, these boots have a natural, soft flex for travel in uneven terrain and through deep snow. The waterproof leather construction and foam insulation add warmth and protection from the elements.

  • ClimaSalomon™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry from snow and water
  • Durable leather upper is highly water-resistant and handle many seasons of wear
  • Abrasion-resistant vamp protects from ski edges
  • 4mm foam with a thick polyethylene lining adds insulation
  • Thermo-formed heel counter for more stability and comfort
  • Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width
name: Salomon Escape Outback Touring Boots - Unisex
